name: Pixel Defenders
description:
Defend your Pixel Kingdom from vagrant bits. Place towers and wield weapons to fend off the attackers.  

Do it for the bitizens of your kingdom. 

Info

Tower Defense in 64x64 for #LowRezJam2017. Programming, artwork, sfx and music by Helios Studio. Made in GameMaker Studio 2.

Current version for LowRezJam submission. Expect more to come! Happy towers.

Controls

  • Press 1 to switch to upgrade mode
  • Press 2 to switch to build mode
  • Press 3 to switch to melee mode
  • Move with WASD or arrow keys

Select towers to upgrade or sell them.
